README.MD:
## Installation: 1. Clone the repository:
url: https://github.com/wchapman/KlustaMat.git
Using command line: git clone https://github.com/wchapman/KlustaMat.git
2. Install [KlustaKwik](https://github.com/klusta-team/example)
Note that if you have cluster cutting software installed that has internal integration with KlustaKwik, you still have to install this version.
## Running: Once in your MATLAB path, you can run KlustaMat with `KlustaMat.RunAxona()` or `KlustaMat.RunNeuralynx` (see file for arguments) ## Updates: Updates will be provided through the GitHub URL.
To update using the GitHub UI, simply sync
To update from terminal: `git pull` from the repository folder ## Mailing List: You may join the Google group [here](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/klustamat) to receive e-mail notifications when new commits are made. ## Citation: The following citations should be used: **KlustaKwik:**
High-dimensional cluster analysis with the Masked EM Algorithm' by Shabnam N. Kadir, Dan F.M. Goodman and Kenneth D. Harris http://arxiv.org/abs/1309.2848
